participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: caring and community-oriented, enjoys sharing life lessons and experiences.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i was poor growing up.

participant_2.name: Emily

participant_2.background: i make straight as in school. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i am currently in high school. i won homecoming queen this year.
